device_type.description:
- bits 16-31: additional information
- bits 0-15: device profile number

error_register.description:
- bit 7: manufacturer specific
- bit 6: reserved (always 0)
- bit 5: device profile specific
- bit 4: communication error (overrun, error state)
- bit 3: temperature
- bit 2: voltage
- bit 1: current
- bit 0: generic error

cob_id_emergency_message.description:
- bit 31: not valid
- bit 30: reserved
- bits 29-11: always 0
- bits 10-0: CAN-ID

producer_heartbeat_time.description: heartbeat producer time in ms; 0 = disable

0x1.name: vendor_id
0x1.description: manufacturer vendor id set by CiA

0x2.name: product_code
0x2.description: ids a specific type of CANopen devices

0x3.name: revision_number
0x3.description:
major and minor version of CANopen device
- bits 16-31: major version
- bits 0-15: minor version

0x4.name: serial_number
0x4.description: unqiue device id for a product group or revision

0x2.name: status
0x2.description:
- 0x00: Command completed, no error, no reply
- 0x01: Command completed, no error, reply
- 0x02: Command completed, error, no reply
- 0x03: Command completed, error, reply
- 0xFF: Command executing

scet.description: CCSDS Unsegmented Time Code (CUC) object for Spacecraft Elapsed Time (SCET)

utc.description: CCSDS Day Segmented Time Code (CDS) object for UTC time
